answers.answer: Hi there. You need to get checked for vitamin deficiencies like B12 and folate, hypothyroidism , autoimmune diseases like rheumatoid arthritis, compression of nerves in the back due to disc prolapsed in the spine, diabetes mellitus, etc. trigeminal nerve needs to be checked. Review any drugs that you are taking. Consult a neurologist, examine you clinically, and rule out the factors possible to be causes. Treatment would depend on the cause.

question: I have a 3 month old baby and recently have been feeling numbness in my face mouth, hands and feet. what could be wrong?
title: numb
